purpose: To provide an AI-powered chat experience on Telegram, leveraging multiple AI models and APIs for enhanced interaction.
principle: Utilizes Python with integrations to GPT-3.5/4, Claude, and other AI models via APIs, hosted on platforms like Zeabur and fly.io.
reusability: The bot can be deployed using Docker and configured with various API keys for different AI models, allowing customization and scalability.
limitations: Dependent on external AI APIs which may incur costs, requires configuration of API keys and deployment environment.
name: ChatGPT-Telegram-Bot
description: TeleChat: ü§ñÔ∏è an AI chat Telegram bot can Web Search Powered by GPT-3.5/4/4 Turbo/4o, DALL¬∑E 3, Groq, Gemini 1.5 Pro/Flash and the official Claude2.1/3/3.5 API using Python on Zeabur, fly.io and Replit.
highlight: Integrates multiple AI models and APIs to provide a versatile Telegram chat experience with web search capabilities.
